mutants.code:
def distribute_candies(n: int, m: int) -> list[int]:
    candies_per_friend = []
    while n >= 0:
        k = n // m
        candies_per_friend.append(k)
        n -= k
        m -= 1
    return candies_per_friend

        n -= k

    return candies_per_friend
